Ellen went back to look, amazed, as the goat birthed an adorable baby! explanation: It is likely the farmer reassured her before he called the vet because he always calls after the animal gives birth.

event: Jason closed his business in the winter starts after sales slowed down during the winter months story: Jason started an ice cream stand that was open year-round. During the summer his business was booming! Unfortunately, sales slowed down during the winter months. It wasn't worth the money to keep the business open in the winter. Jason decided to turn his ice cream stand into a seasonal business.
